channel.title: ops on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in ops on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Claim your Peeps NFT
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is Peeps NFT Peeps NFT is an NFT collection specialized for Dwarves Foundation members. This NFT will grant the access to internal communication channels and many earning opportunities.

item.title: How We Set Up a Recording Workflow for Dwarves Office Hours
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are many interesting topics shared in the Office Hours of Dwarves Foundation, and it would be a pity if anyone missed them.
